title: Big Mistake of My Life: "Personal, Professional, Physical, Mental and Spiritual Development."
description: “Wisdom of Life Transformation” is meant for the organizational excellence. Lead people effectively. (1) For Overall To create a overjoyed life of real success, real achievement and real happiness. This will help you to live a life of your dream, to live a more happy life, to live a more satisfied life, to live a more inspirational life, to live a more discipline life, to live a more meaningful life and to live a more extraordinary life which is full of possibilities.(2) Organizational To achieve, self-mastery, simplicity, self-dependence, self-enjoyment time leadership, positive outlook of life for self-expansion and to create a life of purpose, possibility, peace for peak performance and to reach world class status.
author: Yudhishthir Singh Rathore
